en.name: AR-15 Geissele SMR MK8 7 inch M-LOK handguard (BLK)
en.description: The Super Modular Rail (SMR) MK8 M-LOK™ is Geissele’s ultra-modular model. The SMR MK8 is one of the first rails available to utilize the Magpul M-LOK technology. These rails are designed to give the user full modularity while maintaining a strong and rigid platform.
